All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddBookQuantityController
The AddBookQuantityController class is responsible for managing the user interface interactions related to adding quantity to a book inventory in the library management system.
AddBookQuantityService
The AddBookQuantityService class provides functionality to increase the quantity of books associated with a given BookInventory.
AdministratorBooksController
The AdministratorBooksController class is responsible for managing the user interface interactions related to book administration in the library management system.
AdministratorBooksDialogController
Controller for the dialog that allows administrators to manage books within a specific book inventory.
AdministratorBooksDialogService
The AdministratorBooksDialogService class provides functionality for managing book-related actions within a dialog for administrators.
AdministratorBooksService
The AdministratorBooksService class provides functionality for managing book inventories and associated book forms within the administration module.
AdministratorOperatorsController
Controller for managing operators in the administrator view.
AdministratorOperatorsService
The AdministratorOperatorsService class provides functionality for managing operators (non-administrator users) within the administration module.
AdminNotFoundException
 
Author
The Author class represents an entity that encapsulates information about an author in the library management system.
AuthorRepository
The AuthorRepository class provides specific repository operations for managing Author entities using Hibernate as the underlying ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) framework.
Book
The Book class represents an entity that encapsulates information about a book in the library management system.
BookForm
The BookForm class represents an entity that encapsulates information about a form created by a reader to borrow or return books.
BookFormRepository
The BookFormRepository class provides specific repository operations for managing BookForm entities using Hibernate as the underlying ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) framework.
BookFormShowController
Controller for displaying details of a book form in the operator view.
BookFormShowService
The BookFormShowService class provides services related to displaying and managing book return forms.
BookFormStatus
The BookFormStatus enum represents the possible statuses of a book request form in a library system.
BookInventory
The BookInventory class represents an entity that contains information about a collection of books sharing identical title, author, and genre.
BookInventoryRepository
The BookInventoryRepository class provides specific repository operations for managing BookInventory entities using Hibernate as the underlying ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) framework.
BookInventorySearchEngine
Search engine implementation for searching book inventories.
BookInventorySearchEngineException
 
BookRegistrationService
The BookRegistrationService class provides functionality for registering new books and managing the corresponding book inventory.
BookRepository
The BookRepository class provides specific repository operations for managing Book entities using Hibernate as the underlying ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) framework.
BookStatus
The BookStatus enum represents the possible statuses of a book in a library system.
BookTableViewBuilder
The BookTableViewBuilder class implements the TableViewBuilder interface to create and configure JavaFX TableView columns for the Book entity.
BookTreeTableViewBuilder
The BookTreeTableViewBuilder class implements the TreeTableViewBuilder interface to create and configure JavaFX TreeTableView columns for the Book entity.
ContextMenuBuilder
The ContextMenuBuilder class provides a convenient way to create a JavaFX ContextMenu with specified menu items and their corresponding ActionEvent handlers.
Controller
The Controller interface serves as the base interface for all JavaFX controllers in the library frontend.
CreateBookFormController
Controller for creating a book form in the operator view.
CreateBookFormService
The CreateBookFormService class provides services for creating and managing book lending forms.
CreateOperatorController
Controller for creating new operator accounts in the administrator view.
CreateOperatorService
The CreateOperatorService class provides functionality to create operator accounts.
CreateReaderProfileController
Controller for creating a new reader profile in the operator view.
CreateReaderProfileService
The CreateReaderProfileService class provides services for creating new reader profiles.
CustomHighlightingLoggerName
The CustomHighlightingLoggerName class is a Logback ForegroundCompositeConverterBase implementation that provides custom highlighting for the logger name in log messages.
CustomHighlightingLogLevel
The CustomHighlightingLogLevel class is a Logback ForegroundCompositeConverterBase implementation that provides custom highlighting for log levels in log messages.
CustomHighlightingMarker
The CustomHighlightingMarker class is a Logback ForegroundCompositeConverterBase implementation that provides custom highlighting for log messages based on the presence of a specific marker.
CustomHighlightingMessage
The CustomHighlightingMessage class is a Logback ForegroundCompositeConverterBase implementation that provides custom highlighting for log messages based on their log levels.
CustomHighlightingPackageName
The CustomHighlightingPackageName class is a Logback ForegroundCompositeConverterBase implementation that provides custom highlighting for log messages based on their log levels.
CustomHighlightingThread
The CustomHighlightingThread class is a Logback ForegroundCompositeConverterBase implementation that provides custom highlighting for log messages based on the thread name.
CustomHighlightingTimestamp
The CustomHighlightingTimestamp class is a Logback ForegroundCompositeConverterBase implementation that provides custom highlighting for log messages based on their timestamp and log level.
DBEntity
The DBEntity interface is a marker interface that represents an entity in the database.
DialogUtils
The DialogUtils class provides utility methods for displaying various types of JavaFX dialogs, including alerts and confirmation dialogs.
EmailException
 
EmailSenderService
The EmailSenderService class provides functionality for sending emails using JavaMail API.
EventNotification
The EventNotification class represents a notification associated with an event for a specific user.
EventNotificationRepository
The EventNotificationRepository class provides methods to interact with the database for managing EventNotification entities.
Genre
The Genre enum represents different genres that can be assigned to books in a library system.
HiddenCheckBoxListCell<T>
The HiddenCheckBoxListCell class extends ListCell<T> and is designed to be used with JavaFX ListView or TableView cells.
InboxController
Controller for managing the operator's inbox, displaying event notifications.
InboxService
The InboxService class provides services for managing event notifications related to users.
IncorrectInputException
 
InvalidQuantityException
 
InventoryTableViewBuilder
The InventoryTableViewBuilder class implements the TableViewBuilder interface to create and configure JavaFX TableView columns for the BookInventory entity.
LibraryApplication
The main class representing the entry point for the Library Application.
LibraryException
 
LogInController
The LogInController class is responsible for handling user login interactions in the library management system.
LogInService
The LogInService class provides functionality related to user authentication and login.
NonExistentServiceException
 
ObjectCannotBeNullException
 
OperatorBooksController
Controller for managing operator tasks related to books, including searching, archiving, and handling book forms.
OperatorBooksDialogController
Controller class for the operator's dialog displaying books associated with a specific book inventory.
OperatorBooksService
The OperatorBooksService class provides services for managing book-related operations and book inventory for operators in the library system.
OperatorNotFoundException
 
OperatorReadersController
Controller class for the operator's management of readers.
OperatorReadersService
The OperatorReadersService class provides services for managing operations related to readers performed by operators in the library system.
OperatorSearchEngine
Search engine implementation for searching operators.
OperatorSearchEngineException
 
OperatorTableViewBuilder
The OperatorTableViewBuilder class implements the TableViewBuilder interface to create and configure JavaFX TableView columns for the User entity.
Ratings
The Rating enum represents different rating levels that can be assigned to items in a library system.
Reader
The Reader class represents a library reader with personal information, contact details, and a list of associated book forms.
ReaderException
 
ReaderNotFoundException
 
ReaderRating
The ReaderRating class represents the rating of a library reader, including a coefficient that influences the rating and the current calculated value.
ReaderRatingRepository
The ReaderRatingRepository class provides methods for interacting with the database to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on ReaderRating entities.
ReaderRepository
The ReaderRepository class provides methods for interacting with the database to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on Reader entities.
ReaderSearchEngine
Search engine implementation for searching readers.
ReaderSearchEngineException
 
ReaderTableViewBuilder
The ReaderTableViewBuilder class implements the TableViewBuilder interface to create and configure JavaFX TableView columns for the Reader entity.
RegisterNewBookController
Controller for registering new books in the administrator view.
Repository<T extends DBEntity>
The Repository class provides a generic implementation for basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations using Hibernate as the underlying ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) framework.
ResumeShowController
Controller class for displaying the resume content in a separate window.
ReturnBookException
 
Role
The Role enum represents different roles that users can have in a library system.
SceneLoader
The SceneLoader class provides utility methods for loading JavaFX scenes and managing stages.
SearchEngine<T>
Generic interface for search engines.
SearchEngineException
 
Service
The Service interface serves as a common contract for all service implementations within the application.
ServiceFactory
The ServiceFactory class is responsible for creating instances of various service classes based on the provided service type.
StrongPasswordValidator
The StrongPasswordValidator class implements the Validator interface to check if a given password meets strong password criteria.
TableViewBuilder<T>
The TableViewBuilder interface defines a contract for classes responsible for building and configuring JavaFX TableView columns.
TransportException
 
TreeTableViewBuilder<T>
The TreeTableViewBuilder interface defines a contract for classes responsible for building and configuring JavaFX TreeTableView columns.
User
The User class represents a system user with a unique identifier, username, password, and role.
UserExistException
 
UserNotFoundException
 
UserRepository
The UserRepository class provides access to user-related database operations using Hibernate as the underlying ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) framework.
Validator
The Validator interface defines a contract for classes that perform validation on a given value.
